text: Sodom aru Gomorrah aru usorte thaka sheher dusra khan ke kora nisena he, taikhan bhi nijorke bebichari laga kaam te nijorke hali se, aru ki to Isor pora kori bole diya nai etu laga biya itcha kaam khan he korise. Taikhan dusra manu khan nimite ekta sakhi hoise kunkhan norok laga anonto jui te dukh paikene jolibo1.7 Gen. 19:11-28; Deu. 29:23; 1 Pet. 2:6..
